titleStmt.title: A profitable booke of Maister John Perkins felowe of the inner temple treating the lawes of Englande.
Perutilis tractatus
titleStmt.author: Perkins, John, d. 1545.

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Perkins, John. Incipit perutilis tractatus magistri Johannis Parkins.
A copy sold at Swan Galleries (12 March 1992, lot 246) had owner's purchase inscription dated 8 May 1559.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
